attributes.action: Order the British Olympic Committee to boycott the 2008 Olympic Games in Beijing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chinese government are turning these games into a political circus which is totally against the philosophy of the Games. They are ordering foreign athletes not to bring Tibetan flags to Beijing, even if they are in their own rooms. This is a breach of the Athletes human rights and their right to protest should they wish to do so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
